Articles.Content:
Howdi,

I am a musician at heart for like suince I was 4; guitar, piano, synth, sax, trumpet, etc... so I want to get back into the groove.

I went to see Edgar Winter band and Vanilla Fudge - very good - oh ya and Rare Earth lead voce singer I think it was - great concert with lobsters galore ...!

So I listen to Edgar Einter and hear of the loss of his bro - sad dont know the specifics but ya know he got some good tunes and I figure I gonna do a tribute some day maybe - and play one or 2 of his tunez on google-plus - I gonna play each part live and learn the music - may not be the best but it will be fun if and whenever I get my korg synth cleaned up.

Gonna play some blues and such in town maybe I dunno but I gonna work up some backing music and whenever it gets ready yer all invited ! Only 10 live members on google-plus at a time tho so I can maybe multicast on my USTream channel.

I also have music on Acidplanet and do collabs there on occasion.

So if anyone likes blues instrumentals and light jazz lemme know...my chess instruction gonna hit the road I think...music beats chess any day !

Cmdr Zeta
